group.MUTE_INFO: Mutes a user for a specified duration.
group.BAN_INFO: Bans a user from the group.
group.KICK_INFO: Kicks a user from the group.
group.ADD_INFO: Adds a user to the group.
group.PROMOTE_INFO: Promotes a user to admin with specified permissions.
group.RESTRICT_INFO: Restricts a specific action in the group.
group.UNRESTRICT_INFO: Removes a restriction in the group.
group.REVOKE_INFO: Revokes the current group invite link.
group.PIN_INFO: Pins a message in the group.
group.OPEN_INFO: Allows everyone to send messages in the group.
group.CLOSE_INFO: Restricts sending messages to admins only.
group.NOT_ADMIN: You must be an admin to use this command!
group.NO_USER: No user specified or invalid input.
